elements.title: Grand Jubilee of 1814 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that at least one man was killed during the Grand Jubilee of 1814 when a pagoda (pictured) in St James's Park burnt down?

elements.title: Bill Mullahey (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Pan Am executive Bill Mullahey was nicknamed "Mr. Pacific" for his work promoting tourism to Hawaiʻi and other island destinations?

elements.title: Balloon (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Michael Herbig, director of the 2018 film Balloon about the 1979 East German balloon escape, would not have made it without the blessing of the families who carried it out?

elements.title: Norman Dawe (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that after Norman Dawe died, he was described as "a victim of [ice] hockey because he worked too hard for it"?

elements.title: Diamonds from Sierra Leone (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Kanye West's "Diamonds" was re-recorded as "Diamonds from Sierra Leone" after Q-Tip informed him about blood diamonds in Sierra Leone?

elements.title: a hoard of Viking treasure (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a hoard of Viking treasure was found in 1912 when it fell out of peat fuel being placed on a fire?

elements.title: WTAF-TV (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Indiana's WTAF-TV fought for more than six years to obtain a network affiliation and reached an agreement with NBC just ten days before shutting down for good?

elements.title: Marsh Family (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Marsh Family's parody of Les Misérables's "One Day More" required pizza?

elements.title: 空姐被冻瑟瑟发抖：海航领导深夜体验北京0度寒风 (快科技)
elements.contents:
近日全国多地急剧降温，而海南航空的领导集体飞往北京，穿着夏装，体验接近0度的寒风。这是为什么？

elements.title: 无需打针 我国新型新冠疫苗第三针效果公布：抗体暴涨300倍 (快科技)
elements.contents: 我国的新冠疫苗接种剂量已经超过22亿，目前部分地区开始接种第三针加强针了。除了灭活疫苗等选择之外，第三针疫苗还有别的选择，康希诺日前公布了吸入型新冠疫苗的最新研究数据，作为第三针的话

elements.title: 官方：App开屏弹窗毒瘤 终于清零！ (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 避免不公平现象！我国年终奖纳税方式要变了 能差上万元 (快科技)
elements.contents:
从2022年1月1日起，年终奖就要并入当年综合所得一并计算缴纳个人所得税了，而今年（2021年）内的年终奖收入仍可以单独计税。

elements.title: 一对老夫妻阳性 曾在三省区旅游！轨迹一图读懂 (快科技)
elements.contents:
10月17日，陕西省卫健委通报2例外省游客核酸检测阳性，二人为夫妻，曾在三个省区旅游。
病例1闫某，女，62岁，病例2姜某，男，62岁，两人系夫妻，均为上海某高校退休教师。

elements.title: 视频：航天员大型拆快递现场 王亚平冲天辫改丸子头了 (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: “北京明白”网络走红 最美侧颜男揭秘：精神让人敬佩 (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 微信又崩了！大量用户无法收发图片：5G网络也不行 (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 上海旅行团到西安旅游 7人阳性：途径轨迹公布！网友无语 (快科技)
elements.contents:
今天（10月18日）上午，西安市召开新冠肺炎疫情联防联控新闻发布会，会上通报了疫情防控工作情况。
